verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lamb of God, sweet Lamb of God,
Light of the World, Holy One.
The name of Jesus, sweet name of Jesus,
Rock of Salvation, Messiah is come!

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
And we lift our praise;
With humble hearts we raise
A song of hope and thanks.
We rejoice in Your grace.

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
We rejoice in Your grace.
We rejoice in Your grace.
We rejoice in Your grace.
